title: "GenScript embraces automation at its first cell, gene therapy manufacturing US site"
excerpt: "GenScript rolled out its first cell and gene therapy manufacturing facility in the U.S. As the Chinese CDMO and CRO sets its sights on speeding up production in developing new vaccines, the 50,000-square-foot facility marks GenScript’s first automated plant in the the country."
